p radhana anthar - k riyawan satharak pamanak danata handunagena atha: p rabalathawaya aduwana aakarayata, eewa: p rabala, wid yuthchumbaka, dubala, saha guruthwaja lesin dakweyi. 1970 ganan ha 1980 ganan waladi sidu kala adhi - shakthi bhauthika wid yathmaka nirikshanayan anuwa thahawuru wuye dubala saha wid yuth chumbaka balayan yanu wadath mula - dharmika wid yuthdubala anthark riyawaka bhawa p rakashayan bawaya.
